text.Title: Technical Improvements and Plugin Updates by ElizaOS

Content.text: Several ElizaOS plugins saw major and minor fixes aimed at enhancing code quality, type safety, and maintainability.
Notable plugins updated include Zerion, Story, Akash, and Zksync-era, with efforts focused on type definitions, linter warnings, and dependency enhancements.
Bitcoin experienced a substantial dip in value today, plummeting by 69.98% to $101,701 with a 24-hour trading volume of $89,995,177,496.
Ethereum's price decreased to $3,160.67 with a 45.60% drop and Solana also experienced a smaller decline to $234.49.
ElizaOS also improved its documentation by updating the embedding functions and integrating new examples to assist developers in using the system more effectively.
The client documentation for Telegram and Discord received attention to detail, paving the way for improved community engagement.
Safe Agentathon and Sozu AI Hackathon are drawing attention with substantial prize pools urging developers to build on the intersection of AI and crypto.
